short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your feedback game to next level with voice comment & auto transription on Gsuite,notion,miro and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rumour is an easy-to-use browser extension that lets you be more productive while you work on the web & turn comments into conversational feedback in real-time through voice comments on the comment box in your favourite web apps like G Suite, Notion, miro, Jira etc. Its intuitive AI enables real-time transcription & translation to 10+ languages.
